author: Noelle Haynes
title: Street closing for maintenance in Mahoning County

sentence: YOUNGSTOWN, Ohio (WKBN) – After a 50-minute call with Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, Valley Congressman Tim Ryan said it’s clear that the U.S. can do more to help.
author: Chelsea Simeon
title: ‘They need planes,’ Ohio Congressman says after talks with Ukraine president

author: Katelyn Amato
title: State funding granted to Mahoning County projects

sentence: “Efficient transportation and good-paying jobs are key as we work to secure a sustainable, American-made transportation future,” U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan, D-13 Ohio, said in the news release announcing the funds.
title: Region Gets $6.19M in Federal Transit Funds
